price: 197.Too usun edde yanin temqo dago duyyê Вахау tamurruqey edde hatkaana kinni, tohuk lakal Qhiyaamah Ayró orbeynaa kee madab keenik jahannam gira kinni, jahannam gira is manxu gacta fidooy.
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ قَلِيلٞ ثُمَّ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: matāʿun qalīlun thumma mawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihādu
